summary.span: 包含符合 W3C 规范的数据类型的包装类。

span.span: Contains wrapper classes for the data types that conform to the W3C specification.

summary.span: 所有日期和时间类型都符合 ISO 标准规范。

span.span: All date and time types conform to the ISO standards specification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅 [XML 架构第2部分：数据类型规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/)。For more information, see the [XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/).
